physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph:''Children working in the summer garden. National Home for Jewish Children at Denver c late 1920's - 1930's, #388, Building was first a hospital then became superintendent's cottage. Superintendent William Cohen bought the vegetables from the individuals who worked in the garden.''

mods.abstract: Several children working in a summer garden at the National Home for Jewish Children. The building in the background was first a hospital and then became the superintendent's cottage.

name.namePart: National Home for Jewish Children in Denver
